definition: the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia

sentences.english: A ten meters tall arbutus, summer, laden with fruit.
sentences.chinese: 一棵十几米高的杨梅树，初夏，结满了果实。

sentences.english: One day in early summer I walked past a beautiful meadow.
sentences.chinese: 一天初夏，我走过一块美丽的草场。

sentences.english: This is one of the most interesting sight during the early summer in the …
sentences.chinese: 这是阳明山区初夏的溪流中有趣的景观。

sentences.english: The optimal sowing period and the growth of summer maize are often affected by the high temperature and less rainfall in the early Summer.
sentences.chinese: 初夏高温少雨，常影响夏玉米适时播种和苗期生长。

sentences.english: In early summer, the turtle digs out a hollow in the soft ground.
sentences.chinese: 初夏，龟在松软的泥地上挖一个洞。

sentences.english: Kyabje Dorzong Rinpoche was born in early summer, at sunrise.
sentences.chinese: 德颂仁波切出生于初夏的日出时分。

sentences.english: The lambs must be made off fat early in summer.
sentences.chinese: 初夏时必须把羊羔喂肥以便出售。

sentences.english: Early summer is the best time for eating crayfish.
sentences.chinese: 而初夏就是品尝小龙虾的最佳时间。

sentences.english: In the next episode of A Tale of Three Cities, the pleasant notion of theme tours to pass those balmy summer days.
sentences.chinese: 下期《三城记》我们在初夏时分向你推荐主题旅游。

sentences.english: Today, I finally achieved what I wished and arrived at Dabancheng.
sentences.chinese: 初夏里的一天，我终于如愿以偿，来到达坂城。

sentences.english: Clematis wilt most frequently shows up in early to mid-summer.
sentences.chinese: 铁线莲枯萎病常常发生在初夏到仲夏这段时期。

sentences.english: The sea wind in early summer let me fly.
sentences.chinese: 初夏的海风吹得让我想飞起来。

sentences.english: I don't know what to call the May here. As early spring, or as early summer.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道该把这里的五月称作初春，还是称作初夏。

sentences.english: Early summer came in order to return to the field teacher a vase.
sentences.chinese: 初夏此次前来是为了还友田老师一个花瓶。

sentences.english: Jimmy's Gran loved roses and early summer.
sentences.chinese: 吉米的外祖母很喜欢玫瑰，也很爱初夏的季节。

sentences.english: Exactly be early summer , weather fever of spreading now.
sentences.chinese: 此时正是初夏，天气乍热。

definition: early autumn/7th month of the lunar calendar
Chunri or Chunjih township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
